title: Chris Klemmer's Barstool Idol Pitch
description:
After a month of preparation, Chris Klemmer gets his chance to pitch himself for a job at Barstool Sports. Kirk, Mike & Dave react to the first day of Barstool Idol.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
